ExCnt.EX: We primarily observe the world around us with the naked eye , thus grossly , macroscopically .
Macroscopically , the lesion is a raised nodule with a visible central orifice.
In detached leaves , plant cells remained relatively intact , inspite of the necrosis which was visible macroscopically .
The lesion may extend to the next tissue layer in teeth , the dentine , without macroscopically visible breakdown or even microcavity formation at the tooth surface .
The practice of routinely conserving macroscopically normal ovaries in women aged over 40 years at the time of hysterectomy may not be justified .
So it's quite possible for the brain to be macroscopically deterministic even though there is an underlying indeterminism at the quantum level .
To be of practical use, the separated domains have to be aligned macroscopically over large areas.
